name: Techmas
description:
Technology Marketing Solutions was established in 2010, bringing expertise from both software engineers and analytical specialists with a proven record of accomplished projects. Our service portfolio ranges from mobile applications, web development, and online analytical systems up to code audit and IT consulting.
Techmas rated in TOP-30 (Ruward, 2016) mobile application developers in Russia.

In 2014, our London branch opened, and now we are up to global challenges.
